channel.title: Client Dev Tools
channel.description:
Needs more suggestions.. really don't know what to add.
This is not in the official client but a separate branch if your concerned.
[IMG]http://www.image-upload.net/di-4V7J.jpg[/img] ? Also looking into having npc ids hover over the npcs head like the rs2 servers, anyone know about this ^ Thanks vortex.
[code=features] Mouse Coords Npc Ids Item Ids Coords [/code]

item.title: Client Dev Tools

did anyone bother to attempt to contact newbiehacker? last i recall he has a rsc cache editor either completed or in progress.

There’s plenty of information about cache around, use search and maybe you will find something handy.

item.title: Client Dev Tools
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Thanks vortex. Just needed the right direction. Little bit of tweeking and I will have it down.

We still need to cover the cache editing sometime. No customization at all atm.
Is there any documentation on the cache that you have or we can dig up?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Dev Tools
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:1, topic:440632”]Also looking into having npc ids hover over the npcs head like the rs2 servers, anyone know about this?[/quote]That’s easy. Look at the part where chat message boundaries are set in drawNPC.
What I had in mind was to have a separate tool box to compress and decompress the data archives, to convert the models to obj and back. Same with sprites.

Read full topic
